name: Marcela Resort & Spa
address: 125 Calle Hortensias, 48399 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Set in Puerto Vallarta and with Los Muertos Beach reachable within 500 metres, Marcela Resort & Spa offers concierge services, rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is located less than 1 km from Amapas Beach, 1.6 km from Conchas Chinas Beach and 11 km from Puerto Vallarta International Convention Center. The property features a year-round outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and garden. The units in the resort are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Every room has a kettle, while selected rooms will provide you with a patio and others also have city views. At Marcela Resort & Spa all rooms come with bed linen and towels. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Mexican and Pizza cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. You can play mini-golf at Marcela Resort & Spa. Aquaventuras Park is 18 km from the resort. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 12 km from Marcela Resort & Spa.

name: Hacienda San Angel
address: Miramar 336, El Centro, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a restaurant, Hacienda San Angel is located in Puerto Vallarta. Free WiFi access is available. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport is 9.2 km from the property. A cable TV with a DVD player, air conditioning and a minibar are included in all rooms at Hacienda San Angel. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Puerto Vallarta Hacienda San Angel a garden a terrace and a bar are available. Other facilities offered at the property include a games room, an ironing service and laundry facilities. The hotel is 5.1 km from Cruise Ship Pier. Malecon Boardwalk is 10 minutes’ walk from Hacienda San Angel.

name: Costa Sur Resort By Vrhost
address: Carretera hacia Barra de Navidad, 48390 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Costa Sur Resort by VRHost has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a garden and terrace in Puerto Vallarta. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a kids' club and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can make use of a bar. At the hotel the rooms include air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a sea view. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Camarones Beach is 2.5 km from Costa Sur Resort by VRHost, while Puerto Vallarta International Convention Center is 8.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Hilton Vallarta Riviera Resort,Puerto Vallarta
address: Carretera Barra de Navidad km 4.5, 48390 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: No description found

name: Sheraton Buganvilias Resort and Convention Center
address: Blvd. Francisco Medina Ascencio No. 999, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Effortless and elevated, our newly renovated Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center is a smart way to stay in stunning Jalisco, Mexico. Thrive in our beachfront location close to the city and less than a quarter mile from downtown shops and restaurants at Malecon Boardwalk and 4.1 miles from Gustavo Diaz Ordaz International Airport. Relax in a Puerto Vallarta hotel room or suite with luxury bedding, marble bathrooms, flat-screen TVs, room service and oceanfront views. Recharge with our wide variety of renovated restaurants and keep moving with our four tennis courts, two outdoor pools, swim-up bar and 24-hour Sheraton Fitness center. When it's time to pamper, book our blissful Maiavé Village spa. Families with children appreciate Sheratoons, providing the little ones with fun and engaging activities. For business travelers, we offer streamlined event spaces and Puerto Vallarta packages for groups. Experience Jalisco, Mexico, the right way at Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center.Marriott

name: Fiesta Americana Puerto Vallarta & Spa Hotel
address: Av. Francisco Medina Ascencio km 2.5, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Location This hotel lies on the Bahía de Banderas bay and is around 200 m from the nearest beach and the town centre with its access to the public transport network. The airport is only some 5 minutes away. Facilities The hotel features 291 accommodation units. A lift can be used to access the upper floors. Amenities include a cloakroom, a safe, currency exchange facilities and a cash machine. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access (for a fee) are available in the public areas. In addition, guests can also enjoy a balcony. The hotel features a range of facilities for guests with disabilities. Gastronomic options offered by the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. The grounds of the hotel feature a playground and an attractive garden. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park. Among the additional services available are a childcare service, medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Most accommodation units additionally feature a balcony or a terrace. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a king-size bed. Extra beds can be requested. A safe and a minibar also feature. The rooms offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. An ironing set is also available to guests. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and an alarm clock. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. The hotel offers an extensive outdoor sport and leisure programme, with tennis, volleyball, golf and horse riding. Those who enjoy watersports can have fun with diving and aquafit. Guests of the hotel can enjoy indoor activities including a gym. A wellness area with a spa can be used by guests of the hotel. For a fee, massage treatments are also available. An entertainment programme, an entertainment programme for children, a disco and a kids' club provide guests with recreational options during their free time. Meals The hotel offers a wide range of bookable meals and board options, including breakfast, lunch, dinner and full board. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Velas Vallarta
address: Paseo de la Marina Norte 585, 48354 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Property Location With a stay at velas vallarta in Puerto Vallarta (Marina Vallarta), you'll be a 3-minute drive from Cruise Ship Terminal and 7 minutes from Malecon. This condominium resort is 0.6 mi (1 km) from Bay of Banderas and 5.6 mi (8.9 km) from Playa de los Muertos. Check-In Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel.Viajes Exito Hotels

name: Grand Miramar All Luxury Suites And Residences
address: Paseo de Los Corales 139, 48390 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: With a stunning view of city and Pacific Ocean, this impressive hotel is located on the hills of the exclusive Conchas Chinas area, 7 minutes’ drive from the famed boardwalk of Puerto Vallarta. The main terrace features 3 pools, one exterior hot tub and activity space. Boasting an adult-only terrace, it features 2 hot tubs and a heated pool. Also, all the suites are richly appointed with a modern-style décor and include a flat-screen TV, luxurious amenities and a distinctive combination of marble and wood detailing. Some units have their own outdoor hot tub. The private chef assures a dining experience for the guests. Venue choices include two specialty restaurants, poolside snacks and 24-hour suite service. A wine and spirits selection is available and the breakfast buffet included is only for adults. Grand Miramar Resort & Spa Puerto Vallarta is the only property with a stunning view of the full bay. It has a lounge snack bar and the service hours are 09:30 to 18:30. Direct transportation including round trip exclusively for guests is offered. The spa has a hydrotherapy area and a large selection of massages and treatments. Professional business meetings, events and weddings can be held at this resort.

name: Now Amber Puerto Vallarta Resort & Spa
address: David Alfaro Siqueiros No.164-A Lote B, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: No description found

name: Maxwell Residences at Indah
address: 478 C Sta. Barbara Conchas Chinas, 48399 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Set in Puerto Vallarta, 300 metres from Amapas Beach, Maxwell Residences at Indah offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms come with a kitchen with a microwave. At Maxwell Residences at Indah all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mexican, Pizza and Seafood cuisine. Vegetarian and vegan options can also be requested. Los Muertos Beach is 400 metres from Maxwell Residences at Indah, while Conchas Chinas Beach is 600 metres away. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: Sunset Plaza Beach Resort & Spa
address: Diego Rivera 121, Zona Hotelera las Glorias, 48330 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: The most amazing sunsets in the Pacific can be enjoyed at Sunset Plaza Resort & Spa. Live the experience of a 4 Diamond Resort, opened in 2010, with 100 ocean front Deluxe rooms and Suites in an exclusive atmosphere with high-end personalized service.Butler service 24 hoursPremium drinks BrandsSeparate adults, family and kids poolsGreen areasHigh tech gym and spaKids Club24 hour parking lotAroma menu (linens or ambience)Pillow menu (lumbar, low, medium and high density)Room terrace with sweeping ocean viewsiHotelier/iStay

name: Casa Kimberly
address: Calle Zaragoza 445, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Set over the azure Banderas Bay, under the lush Sierra Madre Mountains, and surrounded by a sea of undulating terracotta rooftops, Casa Kimberly offers guests an exquisite escape. Nine intimate and luxurious suites, a spa, pool and fine dining restaurant evoke the spirit of enduring romance and inspired glamour.iHotelier/iStay

name: Buenaventura Grand Hotel & Great Moments
address: Avenida Mexico 1301, 48350 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Set in tropical gardens in the heart of Puerto Vallarta, the Buenaventura Grand Hotel & Great Moments is located right on the beach. It has 2 pools, a spa and a wide choice of restaurants. All of the spacious, bright rooms have air conditioning and satellite TV, and some have ocean views and hot tubs. The pools are surrounded by loungers and there are large sun terraces. There is a kids’ club, a giant chess board and a range of activities throughout the day. There is also a gym and a 24-hour business centre. There is a choice of restaurants, offering a range of Mexican and international dishes, from snacks to formal, innovative dining. The Shakti Spa offers a range of treatments, scrubs and massages. There is also a free whirlpool bath.

name: Playa Los Arcos Hotel Beach Resort & Spa
address: Olas Altas 380, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Playa los arcos is a boutique style resort. Is the perfect place for couples family and friends hotel with authentic mexican hospitality located right On the best beach playa del sol breathtaking views of the pacific sea and fully makes for an unforgettable vacation experience.iHotelier/iStay

name: Casa Velas Hotel Boutique & Ocean Club-Adults Only
address: Pelicanos 311 Fracc. Marina Vallarta, 48354 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Casa Velas – Adults only is ideally situated on the Marina Vallarta Golf Club in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico, and features luxurious accommodations as well as first-class amenities and services. Casa Velas – Adults only is surrounded by a peaceful tropical environment. Guests at the hotel can relax in the large swimming pool, or enjoy a tropical drink on the beach or at the swim-up bar. The hotel also boasts a state-of-the-art fitness center as well as relaxing spa services at the on-site wellness center. A short distance from the Casa Velas – Adults only is the El Malecon, a beachfront boardwalk featuring restaurants, bars and shopping centers. The hotel also provides free shuttle service to and from Casa Velas Beach.

name: Hotel Luxury Patio Azul
address: Paseo de Las Conchas Chinas127, 48399 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Hotel Luxury Patio Azul has an outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Puerto Vallarta. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel features a hot tub and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Luxury Patio Azul all rooms have bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Conchas Chinas Beach, Los Muertos Beach and Las Estacas Beach. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 13 km from Hotel Luxury Patio Azul.

name: Luxury Residences at Garza Blanca Preserve Resort & Spa
address: Km 8 Carretera Barra de Navidad, 48390 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Amidst a tropical paradise boasting the beautiful Puerto Vallarta beaches, Garza Blanca Preserve Resort & Spa stands out amongst Mexico’s tropical destinations, leading the way as one of the most luxurious hotels in Mexico. The beachfront luxury resort is located just minutes south of Puerto Vallarta, Mexico on Banderas Bay, protected by the lush Sierra Madre jungle and illuminated by the Pacific Ocean.VRBO

name: Villa Premiere Boutique Hotel & Romantic Getaway
address: Calle San Salvador 117, 48350 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Featuring suites with ocean views, Villa Premiere Boutique Hotel & Romantic Getaway is set on Puerto Vallarta’s main beach. It has a spa and 2 outdoor pools, and offers guests a glass of champagne and a massage on arrival. Each luxurious suite has attractive décor, free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV. Guests also receive butler service. A range of international cuisine is served in the Villa Premiere Boutique Hotel & Romantic Getaway's restaurant. There is also a lobby bar and a swim-up bar. The hotel offers cocktail-making workshops. The Villa Premiere’s spa features a hot tub, sauna and an oxygen bar. Treatments include hydrotherapy, facials and massage. There are daily yoga classes on the beach. The hotel is set next to Puerto Vallarta’s beachfront promenade. The city’s airport is a 10-minute drive away.

description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 225 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Treat yourself with massages and facials. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Property Location With a stay at Las Palmas by the Sea in Puerto Vallarta (Hotel Zone), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Cruise Ship Terminal and Malecon. Dining You can enjoy a meal at AIRE DEL MAR serving the guests of Las Palmas by the Sea, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges. name: Crown Paradise Club Puerto Vallarta
address: Paseo De Las Garzas No. 3, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: With facilities to enjoy as a family, children and parents will have themost unforgettable vacations, filled with fun experiences that they willcherish forever. Spacious and comfortable family rooms and 5-starservices come together so families can experience the magicof sharing and creating stories that will last a lifetime.iHotelier/iStay

name: Secrets Bahia Mita Surf and Spa
address: Av Carretera Cruz De Huanacaxtle – Punta De Mita 5, 63762 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Secrets Bahia Mita Surf & SPA perfectly located in the exclusive area of Bahia de Banderas near Punta Mita, and Marina Cruz de Huanacaxtle on the golden sand beaches of the Banderas Bay, fuses elegant and original design by Sordo Madaleno with nature elements, just minutes from the famous Marina de Cruz de Huanacaxtle. This adults-only getaway offers Unlimited-Luxury® privileges, including limitless gourmet dining and top-shelf spirits, daily activities, live entertainment, and Unlimited Connectivity – offering free Wi-Fi and free calling to the U.S. and Canada. Guests even have the privilege to visit nearby participating resorts with the Sip, Savor & See Dining Experience. All 278 spacious suites offer remarkable tropical views, partial ocean views & ocean views, modern décor and refined luxury amenities including daily refreshed mini-bar and 24-hour room service. Relax at the world-class Secrets Spa by Pevonia® Additionally, all guests have free flow access to nine restaurants, seven bars, two snacks and one coffee shop, and facilities at nearby Dreams Bahia de Mita. Do it all or do nothing at all at this romantic exclusive hideaway. Secrets Bahia Mita – Romantic. Refined. Remarkable.FarePortal

name: Barcelo Puerto Vallarta
address: Km 11.5 Zona Hotelera Sur, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Barcelo Puerto Vallarta is located 12 km from Los Muertos Beach Pier, 19 km from Puerto Vallarta town center, 21 km from Zooligico de Vallarta and Licenciado Gustavo Díaz Ordaz International Airport. The hotel facilities include several restaurants, bar, several pools, children’s pool, gym, massage, tennis court, conference room, wireless internet (extra charge), playground, laundry and car rental. The guestrooms are equipped with bathroom (bath/shower), hair dryer, TV, telephone, mini-bar, safe, A/C and balcony. Address: Zona Hotelera Sur, Km. 11,5, 48300 Jalisco, MexicoWebBeds

name: Holiday Inn & Suites - Puerto Vallarta Marina & Golf, An IHG Hotel
address: Blvd Francisco Medina Ascencio 3630, 48335 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Modern hotel near the Puerto Vallarta Airport. In the exclusive urbanized area in the heart of the Marina area, comes the modern Holiday Inn & Suites Puerto Vallarta Marina & Golf hotel. We pride ourselves in offering warm and welcoming experiences that provide our guests with the best business and leisure travel. Located just a few meters from the Puerto Vallarta International Airport, and close to the International Convention Center, just 10 minutes from downtown Puerto Vallarta. Discover the city by strolling along Puerto Vallarta's famous boardwalk and explore the alleyways of Old Vallarta's cobblestone streets. A lobby with a lounge welcomes you from your daily activities, and our front desk staff is always ready to assist you. Take time to relax in the new Spa Center, which offers a variety of soothing services, and relax in the beautiful pool and hot tub for public facilities while enjoying a panoramic view of the city. Make the most of our meeting rooms and our spacious boardroom with modern equipment to host events or meet with clients. Unwind in comfortable and spacious rooms.IHG Hotels & Resorts

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a spa tub. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a banquet hall. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Free valet parking is available onsite. This hotel is 0.9 mi (1.4 km) from Bay of Banderas and 1.4 mi (2.2 km) from Playa de los Muertos. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. name: Holiday Inn Express Puerto Vallarta
address: Blvd. Francisco Medina Acencio 3974, 48356 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Comfortable hotel near Puerto Vallarta International Airport In the vicinity of the Marina, the comfortable Holiday Inn Express® Puerto Vallarta hotel offers guests the best experience for business and leisure travel. We are a short distance from the Puerto Vallarta International Airport, close to the International Convention Center and 19 minutes from downtown. We are the closest hotel to the city's industrial zone with a location just steps away from Hospiten Hospital, a renowned medical tourism center. Get to know Puerto Vallarta while enjoying the sun at Los Muertos beach or take a tour; and visit the beaches of Las Caletas and Yelapa or the Marietas Islands.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Villa Lala Boutique Hotel Adults Only
address: Carretera Barra De Navidad Km. 16.8, 48354 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Located in Boca de Tomatlán in Puerto Vallarta, Villa Lala Boutique Hotel Adults Only is surrounded by mountains and faces the waterfront. It has free WiFi access available. The suites are brightly decorated in red colours and are spacious. They are equipped with 450 thread-count Egyptian cotton linens, bathrobes, LCD flat-screen HD TVs and are air conditioned. Puerto Vallarta city centre can be reached in a 30-minute drive and there guests will be able to find and explore a variety of restaurants and bistros. The Puerto Vallarta International Airport is 45 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Casa Iguana Mismaloya
address: Avenue 5 De Mayo 455, 48394 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: This Puerto Vallarta hotel features a restaurant and offers a kitchen in every suite. Suites at Casa Iguana All Suites Hotel include a private bathroom and seating area. The suites also have air conditioning and a coffee maker. Room service is available to guests. Casa Iguana offers a restaurant and convenience store. Guests can swim in the outdoor pool. The All Suites Hotel Casa Iguana is within a 5-minute drive to Villa de Guadalupa. The hotel is within 2 miles of the beach. The nearest airport is Puerto Vallarta International Airport just 21 km from the property.

name: Zonaz Boutique Hotel
address: 574 Pino Suárez, 48399 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Situated in Puerto Vallarta and with Los Muertos Beach reachable within 300 metres, ZonaZ Boutique Hotel features concierge services, allergy-free rooms, free bikes, free WiFi and an outdoor swimming pool. This 4-star hotel offers a garden. Every room includes a balcony with views of the city. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At ZonaZ Boutique Hotel rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Puerto Vallarta, like cycling. Amapas Beach is less than 1 km from ZonaZ Boutique Hotel, while Camarones Beach is a 15-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz, 11 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Pinnacle Resorts 180
address: Pulpito 180 Colonia Emiliana Zapata, Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Located in Puerto Vallarta, 6 km from Cruise Ship Pier, Pinnacle Resorts 180 offers accommodation with free WiFi. All units comprise a seating area with a sofa and a fully equipped kitchen with various cooking facilities, including a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. A toaster and coffee machine are also available. Guests can make use of the sauna. An outdoor swimming pool is available for guests to use at the apartment. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Joint Coworking Hotel
address: 108 Insurgentes Emiliano Zapata, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Situated in Puerto Vallarta, 600 metres from Camarones Beach, Joint Boutique Hotel Zona Romantica features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 800 metres from the city centre and less than 1 km from Los Muertos Beach. At the hotel, rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Certain rooms have a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a microwave. The rooms have a safety deposit box. Guests at Joint Boutique Hotel Zona Romantica will be able to enjoy activities in and around Puerto Vallarta, like hiking and cycling. The property has an in-house hot tub, hairdresser's and business centre. Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area. Amapas Beach is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Puerto Vallarta International Convention Center is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 10 km from Joint Boutique Hotel Zona Romantica.

name: Los Tules Villas del Sol
address: Boulevard Francisco Medina Ascencio Km.2.5, Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco, Mexico, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Only 5 minutes’ drive from Marina Vallarta and featuring an outdoor pool, Villas del Sol en Los Tules offers its guests free WiFi access, a spa and private beach area. The bright and functional accommodations include a flat-screen cable TV, kitchen and balconies offering panoramic views of the surroundings. Guests will find a restaurant at Villas del Sol offering à la carte services. A variety of restaurants can be found close to the Malecon Boardwalk. At Villas del Sol en Los Tules guests will enjoy of massage services for an additional fee. Activities that can be enjoyed in the surroundings include table tennis and fishing. The property offers free parking. Puerto Vallarta International Airport is located 5 km away.

name: Amaca Beach Hotel - Quimixto Eco Resort

name: Marboka Hotel & Suites
address: Carretera Costera a Barra de Navidad Km 2.5, Conchas Chinas, 48399 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: On Conchas Chinas beach and surrounded by tropical vegetation, this hotel in Puerto Vallarta offers friendly, personal services and relaxing facilities for a memorable vacation. Playa Conchas Chinas features a relaxing outdoor pool. After a refreshing swim, guests can enjoy a delicious meal in the on-site restaurant. Guests at the Conchas Chinas Playa can easily explore nearby downtown Puerto Vallarta. After browsing the unique shops, guests can visit vibrant nightclubs and bars. A variety of water sports can be practiced at the nearby beach.

name: Capitalia - Tres Mares Beach Residences
address: 197 Avenida Paseo de la Marina Sur, 48450 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: No description found

name: Villa del Palmar Beach Resort & Spa Puerto Vallarta
address: Blvd Francisco Medina Ascencio Km 2.5, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Villa del Palmar Beach Resort & Spa Puerto Vallart is conveniently located in the popular Hotel Zone area. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the property's facilities and services. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Villa del Palmar Beach Resort & Spa Puerto Vallart. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find fan, air conditioning, telephone, television, satellite/cable TV. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities, and close proximity to all that Puerto Vallarta has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Villa del Palmar Beach Resort & Spa Puerto Vallart.Agoda

name: Hacienda Escondida Puerto Vallarta
address: Calle 567 Lazaro Cardenas, 48130 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Offering an outdoor heated pool and ahot tub, Hacienda Escondida Puerto Vallarta is located in Puerto Vallarta, just 1 km from the Pacific Ocean. Each air-conditioned room comes with a cable TV and a private bathroom with a shower and toilet. Some have views of the pool and tropical gardens. At Hacienda Escondida Puerto Vallarta you will find a shared hot tub, while other facilities offered include meeting spaces and a tour desk. Guests can find restaurants and shops within walking distance. Both Marina Vallarta Golf Club and Licenciado Gustavo Diaz Oraz International Airport can be reached in a 20-minute drive.

name: Vamar Vallarta Marina & Beach Resort
address: Av. Paseo De La Marina Sur, 48335 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: This magnificent resort enjoys a prime location overlooking the mesmerising marina of Vallarta and the Bahía de Banderas. Lic. Gustavo Díaz Ordaz International Airport is set just 2.8 kilometres from the hotel and guests will find themselves next to beautiful promenade and boat moorings, as well as shops, restaurants, bars, and vibrant nightlife scene. The establishment comprises ample, light-filled and sumptuously decorated guestrooms, offering a complete escape for senses. Impressive hotel facilities include 3 bars, 2 specialty restaurants and 1 snacks restaurant serving Italian specialties and international cuisine to satisfy even the most discerning palates. The leisure facilities comprise 4 adult pools and 1 kids' pool. The children will take in entertainment programme offered at the kids' club. The resort features versatile meeting rooms accommodating up to 300 persons. Avid golfers may take advantage of nearby golf courses situated within 13.5 kilometres.FarePortal

name: Emperador Vallarta Beachfront Hotel and Suites
address: Amapas 114 Col Emiliano Zapata, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Located in Emiliano Zapata, Emperador Vallarta Beachfront Hotel and Suites is a perfect starting point from which to explore Puerto Vallarta. The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Emperador Vallarta Beachfront Hotel and Suites. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like air conditioning, wake-up service, desk, balcony/terrace, telephone. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Emperador Vallarta Beachfront Hotel and Suites is an excellent choice from which to explore Puerto Vallarta or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Marriott Puerto Vallarta Resort & Spa
address: Paseo La Marina Norte 435, Marina Vallarta, 48354 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Travel your own way at Marriott Puerto Vallarta Resort and Spa. Located steps from one of the most beautiful beaches in Jalisco Mexico our oceanfront resort pampers you with a stunning infinity pool diverse restaurants and the exquisite Ohtli Spa. Allow our Tequila Casamagna to add a little Mexican spark to your lounging experience. Our resort is near downtown Puerto Vallarta as well as Malecon Puerto Vallarta and Galeria Vallarta Mall. You and your loved ones will have plenty to do while at the resort. All rooms and suites come with a balcony or terrace so your will never be far from an incredible view. You will also have a cozy pillowtop mattress to lie on Netflix availability through your flat panel TV and complimentary robes to lounge in. We offer 15 venues indoors and outdoors for special occasions such as an LGTB wedding. Be sure to inquire about our exclusive packages when booking to enjoy unique perks and upgrades. Let Marriott Puerto Vallarta Resort and Spa ensure an inviting and exciting MexicoMarriott

name: Casa Anita
address: Carretera Barra de Navidad # 601, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Set 5 minutes’ walk from Colonia Las Amapas Beach, Casa Anita offers suites with sea views, an indoor and an outdoor swimming pool. Its terrace features a hot tub and views over Puerto Vallarta’s South Shore. Each spacious suite and room at Casa Anita has bright, traditional Mexican décor. There is a balcony, a kitchenette and free Wi-Fi. Cafés, bars and restaurants can be found around the oceanfront. The hotel has 3 barbecue areas. The centre of Puerto Vallarta is a 10-minute drive from Casa Anita. Puerto Vallarta International Airport is 10 km away.

name: Krystal Vallarta
address: Avenida De Las Garzas 30, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Located in Hotel Zone, Krystal Vallarta is a perfect starting point from which to explore Puerto Vallarta. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Krystal Vallarta. Internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, mini bar, balcony/terrace can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hot tub, fitness center, outdoor pool, massage, children's playground. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Puerto Vallarta has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Krystal Vallarta.Agoda

name: Secrets Vallarta Bay Puerto Vallarta Adults Only
address: David Alfaro Siqueiros N. 164, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Situated on the golden sand beach right on the Pacific coast and located just minutes from the famous 'El Malecón' boardwalk. Secrets Vallarta Resort & Spa boasts a world-class spa and an outdoor pool. Guests can also enjoy free WiFi, free calling and the ability to book excursions. The well-appointed rooms offer ocean views, contemporary décor and marble floors. Each elegantly-appointed suite is complete with 24-hour room service, Secrets Box for private room service delivery, turn down service, mini-bar refreshed daily, bathroom with shower and hot tub. Guests can dine at reservation-free gourmet restaurants and bars. Each restaurant offers a unique cuisine, ranging from exceptional Pan-Asian delights to elegant French fare. Relax with your favorite cocktail at any of the three lively bars, featuring premium brand domestic and international brands. The centre of Puerto Vallarta is just over 1 km from the hotel. The city’s airport is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Garlands Del Rio
address: Aquiles Serdan 367, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: 700 metres from Camarones Beach in the centre of Puerto Vallarta, Garlands Del Rio offers accommodation with free WiFi and access to a garden, hot tub and wellness packages. Private parking is available on site. A terrace with river view, a cable flat-screen TV and air conditioning are offered in some units. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy an American breakfast. At Garlands Del Rio you will find a restaurant serving Mexican cuisine. The accommodation offers a picnic area. A car rental service is available at Garlands Del Rio. Los Muertos Beach is 1.1 km from the bed and breakfast, while Amapas Beach is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz, 11 km from Garlands Del Rio, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Garza Blanca Preserve Resort & Spa
address: Km. 7.5 A Barra De Navidad, 48390 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: The spacious open floor plan of this ocean view hotel room exudes a luxurious indoor/outdoor lifestyle. The exquisite finishes of the deluxe room features one king or two queen-sized beds, one bathroom, a fully-stocked wet bar, large flat screen TV, private terrace with sizable hammock along with all the luxury and grandeur of this beautiful ocean view hotel room in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. Room decor is contemporary with earth tones and sleek, modern look; featuring large picture windows that look out on the Pacific. Come and enjoy our beautiful stay.VRBO

name: The Westin Resort & Spa, Puerto Vallarta
address: Paseo De La Marina Sur 205, 48354 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Find your balance among 14 acres of swaying palm trees and fronted by a 410-foot private beach on the Pacific Ocean. The Westin Resort & Spa, Puerto Vallarta offers all this splendor only five minutes from Licenciado Gustavo Díaz Ordaz International Airport and charming downtown Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. Lace up for dining and upscale shops at the marina district across the road. Relax at a beachfront pergola and sparkling pool or book an appointment at our serene spa offering head-to-toe pampering. Our Puerto Vallarta, Mexico, resort hotel features a Westin WORKOUT® Fitness Studio, tennis courts and nearby golf courses. Bright colors and tropical Mexican décor grace every ocean-view hotel room at our resort, and each accommodation includes a private balcony, plush Heavenly® Bed and rejuvenating Heavenly® Bath. Recharge the right way at The Westin Resort & Spa, Puerto Vallarta.Marriott

name: Hyatt Ziva Puerto Vallarta
address: Carretera Barra de Navidad, Km. 3.5 Zona Hotelera Sur, 48390 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a spa and wellness centre, Hyatt Ziva Puerto Vallarta is located in Puerto Vallarta. The VitaMar Spa offers an array of services such as massages, manicures and pedicures as well as body treatments. The accommodation will provide you with air conditioning and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes. At Hyatt Ziva Puerto Vallarta you will find 4 à la carta restaurants, 1 Buffet Restaurant,is an assisted buffet. Deli Coffe Shop from 6am to 11pm. We have HyghlightZ Sports Bar with beverage service from 12hrs to midnight and a heavy snack menu from 4pm to 10pm. 24-hour room service,room service is free of charge. A tennis court and a fitness centre. Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff, meeting facilities and a tour desk. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Cruise Ship Pier located 7.7 km from the property. This resort is 11 km from Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport.

name: Krystal Grand Puerto Vallarta
address: Avenue De Las Garzas Zona Norte, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: No description found

name: Casa Cúpula Luxury Lgbt Boutique Hotel
address: 129 Callejon de la Igualdad, 48399 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Set on the hills overlooking the Pacific Ocean and 5 minutes’ drive from Puerto Vallarta Cathedral, this gay-friendly, adults-only hotel features 2 swimming pools, a hot tub, spa and a sun terrace. The rooms and suites offer contemporary décor, air conditioning, laptop safe, wardrobe and flat-screen satellite TV with DVD player. All accommodations feature minibar, coffee maker and a private bathroom with bathrobes, hairdryer and free toiletries. The on-site Taste restaurant serves Mexican-style dishes and American cuisine and also features views of the tropical forest and the sea. There is also a bar and free Wi-Fi is available in all areas. Casa Cupula Gay Friendly Boutique Hotel is 500 metres from Playa de los Muertos Beach and the dock, and 800 metres from the seafront. The Zoo and Botanical Garden is 10 km away and the Puerto Vallarta International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Almar Resort Luxury Lgbt Beach Front Experience
address: Amapas #380 Col. Emiliano Zapata, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Almar Resort is a cutting edge luxury hotel in Puerto Vallarta incorporating the best traditions of Mexico into a beautiful setting, offering even the most exacting guests accommodations with style and distinction. Luxury meets distinctive contemporary design in each of the more than 120 suites which all offer spectacular ocean views and private terraces. Almar Resort Luxury LGBT Beach Front Experience offers everything you want in a vacation experience.The hotel is under construction so you may experience construction noise until May 31, 2023. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.iHotelier/iStay

name: Costa Sur Resort & Spa
address: Carretera a Barra de Navidad km 4.5, 48310 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: This all-suite hotel is located in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico, on Banderas Bay. The hotel offers a private ocean lagoon, 2 outdoor swimming pools and an on-site restaurant. Costa Sur Resort & Spa features access to non-motorized water sports. A fitness center and spa services are also available at the hotel. Concierge services are offered as well. Guest suites at the Costa Sur are equipped with cable TV and sofa beds. Ocean views are also provided in all suites. Mediterranean cuisine is served on the hotel's Sunset Terrace. La Cascada Restaurant serves international cuisine. Guests can have a drink in the hotel's Barefoot Bar.

name: Crown Paradise Golden Puerto Vallarta
address: Av. Paseo de Las Garzas No. 3, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Located on a breathtaking beach, the 5-star adults-only hotel is theideal place to enjoy moments of relaxation, well-being and fun, anexquisite gastronomic variety and amenities such as spa, recreationareas and theme nights; in an intimate and exclusive environment.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Porto Allegro Puerto Vallarta
address: Calle Hidalgo No. 119, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Located in the center of Puerto Vallarta and 50 meters from Plaza de Armas, Hotel Porto Alegre Puerto Vallarta offers free Wi-Fi and features a roof garden terrace with outdoor minipool and a 24-hour fitness center. The air-conditioned rooms at the Porto Alegre Puerto Vallarta offer flat-screen TV with cable channels. Buffet breakfast is included in the price. Porto Alegre Puerto Vallarta’s bar offers views of the city and Sierra Madre. Isla Cuale can be reached within 5 minutes’ walk. The Centro Romantico with a variety of restaurants and nightclubs is 100 meters from the property. Playa de los Muertos is within 10 minutes’ walk. Puerto Vallarta International Airport is 15 minutes’ drive.

name: Velas Vallarta Condo
address: Av. Paseo de la Marina Nte 585 Apt # 4312, 48350 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: No description found

name: Blue Chairs Resort by the Sea - Adults Only
address: Malecon Y Almendro No. 4, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Blue Chairs Resort by the Sea, 6 miles from Puerto Vallarta International Airport, features a private beach and rooftop pool. Rooms offer balconies with ocean views and flat-screen cable TVs. Guest rooms ceiling fans. They also include coffee makers, bathroom amenities and hairdryers. Guests at Blue Chairs Resort by the Sea are offered a restaurant and bar. The hotel has a spa and provides room service and concierge service. This gay and lesbian-friendly hotel is 1 minute from the seafront. It is 6 miles from Marina Vallarta Golf Club and 7 miles from Canopy Tour El Eden.

name: Melia Puerto Vallarta
address: Paseo De La Marina Sur Lot H-7, 48335 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: This property is located Puerto Vallarta International Airport 6 km away from Puerto Vallarta city center, 8 km away from an eco park, and 3 km away from Puerto Vallarta International Airport. Facilities and services include 24-hour reception, air conditioning, balcony, bar, ATM machine on-site, concierge, dry cleaning (extra charge), elevator, garden, gym, laundry facilities (extra charge), outdoor pool, restaurant, safe, and spa facilities. Rooms feature air conditioning, bath and shower, hairdryer, towels, balcony, safe, television, mini bar, and telephone. Address: Paseo de la Marina Sur 7, 48354, Puerto Vallarta, JAL, Mexico.WebBeds

name: Hotel Mousai - Adults Only
address: Carretera a Barra de Navidad Km. 7.5, 48390 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: The first and only AAA Five Diamond rated resort in Puerto Vallarta and the state of Jalisco, Hotel Mousai’s fresh flirtatious aesthetics and luxurious comfort will inspire you to live sensationally. Hotel Mousai is an amazing vacation, breathing life into every opportunity to provide the sassiest activities and experiences. Located in one of Mexico’s most beautiful beach destinations, Puerto Vallarta.VRBO

name: Grand Park Royal Puerto Vallarta
address: Carretera Barra de Navidad KM 8.5, Zona, 48390 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: With a stay at Grand Park Royal Luxury Resort Puerto Vallarta in Puerto Vallarta (South Shore Hotel Area), you'll be steps from Playa Gemelas and 12 minutes by foot from Garza Blanca Beach. This 4-star property is 4.6 mi (7.3 km) from Playa de los Muertos and 6.1 mi (9.9 km) from Malecon.FlyUS

name: Los Arcos Suites
address: Manuel M Dieguez 164, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Los arcos suites is a beatiful and warm hotel with exquisite mexican architecture perfectly planned for our guests. You will find complete satisfaction with our service comfort and hospitality. Come and experience puerto vallartas charm stay in this boutique hotel and feel the mexican flavor.iHotelier/iStay

name: Club Regina Puerto Vallarta
address: Paseo De La Marina Sur 205, 48335 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Raintree's Club Regina Puerto Vallarta wraps elegance and tradition around relaxing ocean and marina views. Guests have access to all amenities that the resort has to offer including an on-site restaurant and bar, beautiful accommodation and large swimming pools. Beaches and the rich biodiversity draw tourists from around the globe. The Malecon, one of the most popular locations for tourists, is a flourishing art scene on the south side of Vallarta that is home to art galleries, restaurants and bars. This is a 1 bedroom suite with a full kitchen that sleeps 4. It has a king bed in the master bedroom and the couch folds out into a double bed. Must book Saturday-Saturday. Must book at least 60 days in advance. Must contact before booking reservation.VRBO

name: Playa Los Arcos
address: Olas Altas 380 Col. Emiliano Zapata, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: No description found

name: Bellview Hotel Boutique
address: Miramar 363 B Centro, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Well set in the centre of Puerto Vallarta, BellView Hotel Boutique provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. The property is around 300 metres from Camarones Beach, 1.2 km from Los Muertos Beach and 2 km from Amapas Beach. The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Every room comes with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms here will provide you with a kitchen fitted with a fridge. At BellView Hotel Boutique the rooms have bed linen and towels. Puerto Vallarta International Convention Center is 10 km from the accommodation, while Aquaventuras Park is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 10 km from BellView Hotel Boutique.

name: Hotel Posada de Roger
address: Basilio Badillo 237 Col, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Located in downtown Puerto Vallarta, this hotel is 150 metres from Los Muertos Beach and boardwalk. The hotel features Mexican-style architecture, an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms. Each room at Hotel Posada De Roger is individually decorated in traditional Mexican décor. The spacious rooms offer free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen cable TV. They also have a telephone and a ceiling fan. Posada De Roger Hotel features a rooftop terrace surrounded by gardens and featuring mountain views. Guests can use the community kitchen or dine at the on-site Fredys Tucan restaurant. Posada De Roger is located 20 minutes' drive from the Gustavo Diaz Ordaz International Airport and is 5 blocks away from the Museum Del Rio Cuale. Many shops and markets are nearby.

name: Sunscape Puerto Vallarta Resort & Spa
address: Blvd Francisco Medina Ascencio Km 3.5, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Featuring free WiFi and a year-round outdoor pool, Sunscape Puerto Vallarta Resort offers accommodation in Puerto Vallarta, 1.2 km from Cruise Ship Pier. The resort has a children's playground and terrace, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free private parking is available on site. Enjoy a cup of coffee while looking out at the sea or pool. All rooms come with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer, flat-screen TV with cable channels is offered. There is a 24-hour front desk, a cash machine and hairdresser's at the property. This resort has a private beach area and car hire is available. You can play tennis at this resort, and the area is popular for fishing. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 4 km from Sunscape Puerto Vallarta Resort. Family Friendly hotel, please see fine print for additional information.

name: The Hacienda at Krystal Grand Puerto Vallarta
address: Ave. de Las Garzas 136-1, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: With a stay at The Hacienda at Hilton Puerto Vallarta in Puerto Vallarta (South Hotel Zone), you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Malecon and Cruise Ship Terminal. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk.Hotels.com

name: Hacienda Buenaventura Hotel & Mexican Charm
address: Blvd. Francisco Medina Ascencio 2699, 48310 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Discover the charm and serenity of a Mexican Hacienda with lush tropical gardens, palm trees and cascades of fresh crystal water and secluded green areas inviting you to savor tranquility and harmony. Located just a short stroll from the beach and a short drive from town, the hotel offers a freeform freshwater swimming pool with swim up bar and lobby bar.A place where you can recharge your spirit and serenely while away the days - this is our Hotel Hacienda.Conveniently located only 10 minutes from Puerto Vallartas downtown and 5 minutes from the international Airport.iHotelier/iStay

name: Canto Del Sol Plaza
address: Clemente Orozco 125, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Enjoying a prime location on Banderas Bay Beach, right in the heart of Puerto Vallarta's hotel zone, this magnificent complex offers an ideal base to spend a pleasant family holiday as well as a romantic getaway for couples. Guests can find many leisure options in the immediate vicinity and Puerto Vallarta downtown is only a 10-minute drive away. The hotel's guest rooms are tastefully appointed in warm tones and feature some Mexican touches that blends perfectly with the beautiful surrounding area. Room facilities include individual climate control, a 32” flat-screen TV and complimentary Wi-Fi access. When it comes for dining, travellers may choose between different options including authentic regional specialities as well as delicious Italian cuisine, while the pool bars offer light snacks and refreshing cocktails. An on-site spa, a sparkling outdoor pool and a wide variety of recreational activities complete the hotel's facilities and will ensure a truly memorable stay.FarePortal

name: Friendly Vallarta Beach Resort & Spa
address: Blvd. Francisco Medina Ascencio #2199, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: A reimagined and reinvented hotel, made to enjoy, live together, rest and create unique moments. For those who are looking for different, memorable and fun experiences.With one of the best beaches in Puerto Vallarta, excellent location near to hospitals, bars, restaurants, shopping mall, etc. just a few minutes from the Airport and the Malecon or downtown.The friendliest hotel now is fun.iHotelier/iStay

name: San Marino
address: Rodolfo Gomez N 111, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Set at the front of Los Muertos Beach, this hotel offers outdoor swimming pools, a private beach area and daily entertainment. San Marino is located in the lively city of Puerto Vallarta. Rooms at San Marino feature simple décor and air conditioning. Each comes with a cable TV, a phone and a safe, as well as a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. An in-room massage service is available at an extra cost. The pool area includes a children’s pool and loungers, while the beach area includes a volleyball net, loungers and palapa sunshades. There is a free towel service and non-motorized water sports. Guests can dine at El Galeón, which offers Mexican and international cuisine, featuring views of the Pacific Ocean. Most nightclubs and bars can be reached within 10 minutes’ drive. Puerto Vallarta International Airport is 13 km away.

name: Casa Dona Susana
address: Manuel m Dieguez No 171, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Casa Dona Susana Boutique Style Hotel For Adults Only.This hotel offers incomparable service and a relaxing environment so you can enjoy your vacation as you deserve. Unique And Elegant With Its Arched Lobby And Quarry Floors The Hotel Has All Details That Enhance The 19th Century Mexican Hacienda And Colonial Style Atmosphere. Discover casa doa susana the hotel that gurantees you memorable vacations.iHotelier/iStay

name: Puerto Vallarta South Shore Luxury Suites,
address: Carretera Costera a Barra de Navidad 5710, 48292 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Located in Puerto Vallarta, 200 metres from Conchas Chinas Beach, Puerto Vallarta South Shore Luxury Suites, provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Located around 13 km from Puerto Vallarta International Convention Center, the hotel is also 19 km away from Aquaventuras Park. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking hotel features a hot tub. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms are fitted with a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. At Puerto Vallarta South Shore Luxury Suites, each room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Puerto Vallarta, like hiking and fishing. Popular points of interest near Puerto Vallarta South Shore Luxury Suites, include Las Estacas Beach, Amapas Beach and Los Muertos Beach. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Sunscape Residence Tower
address: Boulevard Francisco Medina Ascencio, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Sunscape Residence Tower has a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Puerto Vallarta. Featuring room service, this property also provides guests with a water park. The resort features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a kids' club. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath. At Sunscape Residence Tower all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub. Speaking English and Spanish at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area. Playa de Oro is 400 metres from Sunscape Residence Tower, while Puerto Vallarta International Convention Center is 5.3 km away. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 3 km from the resort.

name: Luxury Ocean Frontage Family Villa For Rent
address: Conchas Chinas
description: Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, a garden, and a terrace, Luxury Ocean Frontage Family Villa For Rent features accommodation in Puerto Vallarta with free WiFi and sea views. Featuring free private parking, the chalet is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as hiking and fishing. The air-conditioned chalet consists of 8 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a coffee machine, and 14 bathrooms with a shower and a hot tub. Towels and bed linen are available in the chalet. Guests at the chalet can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Round-the-clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Spanish. Luxury Ocean Frontage Family Villa For Rent offers a hot tub. A barbecue is available for guests to use at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Luxury Ocean Frontage Family Villa For Rent include Las Estacas Beach, Conchas Chinas Beach and Amapas Beach. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz, 13 km from the chalet, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
